CustomField.description: The Qualified No Shows / Qualified Non-Sponsor for the event.
CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(Qualified_No_Show__c > 0,Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c>0), Qualified_No_Show__c / Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c,0)
/* Changed 06/10/2020. Formerly:
IF(AND(Qualified_No_Show__c > 0,Qualified_Leads__c>0), Qualified_No_Show__c / Qualified_Leads__c,0)
This excluded sponsors (promo code containing "sponsor") in the numerator but not the denominator. */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Qualified No Shows / Qualified Non-Sponsor for the event.
CustomField.label: Qualified No Show Rate
